Params: {1: 'Fallen Star', 2: 'Chapter 9', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{3: 'Somewhere in the desert, battlefield cleanup is underway in a Forsaken base. Sand and dust cover every inch of ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The third time this month...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A dark, long needle-like object protrudes from the ground in the center of the base.'}
{3: 'Defeated mechanoids scatter on the ground nearby. They seem to have been corrupted. Fully-armed soldiers are preparing to ship them to the disposal site.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Luckily we received a warning beforehand and evacuated this base before the conversion probe landed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The frequency of attacks from Punishing-corrupted Territory has been increasing recently. We can't always predict them like this one.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: '...And all other ground forces across the world are losing their bases too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'All because of this "Conversion Probe" launched from areas corrupted by the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'It immediately releases a high-concentration Punishing Virus to control all nearby mechanoids once it lands...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Probes launched from the ground are less of a threat as they usually come from far away. We have depth, so we can still intercept them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe looks up to the sky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But those launched from the low Earth orbit are shielded by the orbital debris. They have high velocity and are almost launched vertically above us...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, do you mean the... corrupted International Space Station...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "It's probably been giving Babylonia a hard time too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah. From our optical observation alone, they have been firing at each other more than ever...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Not just that, Babylonia also pulled back most of their elite ground forces.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Including that Gray Raven squad... They have all been summoned back to reinforce their space forces.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, are you implying...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Right. Our intel shows that Babylonia has decided to eliminate the corrupted space station once and for all.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Wow... Can they really do it? Going against that thing...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I know what you're thinking. For a long time, they could only wear down the space station by attrition.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Probably because there aren\'t many experienced "Fenrir" pilots left in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Ever since the Great Retreat, most good pilots in Babylonia have come to Mr. Watanabe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "From a strategic point of view, Babylonia would never start the war if they didn't have a decisive winning factor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They must be hiding some secret we don't know.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Are you saying...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'From our past simulations... Once the threat and communication interference from the space station are reduced...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The world will start to change.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So this war will likely determine the future direction of the world.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "If that's the case...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Right. The Forsakens must be part of this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We have long prepared for it—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Forsakens, assemble!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Follow the protocol—disable all concealments of the base, and try to establish a communication channel with Babylonia!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Activate all defense systems in the base and open two-thirds of our hangers. You have three hours to complete pre-flight checks...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Transfer surface authority to the standby operation officers in the ground mission control center.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Sir, are you going to...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm still the leader of the Forsaken on paper. Now's not the time to be capricious.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This arrangement doesn't mean we're compromising or cooperating. I'll get us the leverages we deserve.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldiers', 3: 'Sir, we will fight with you!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Soldiers', 3: 'We are the Forsaken—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We never forget...', 4: '1'}
